publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-4329.1 Alex Johnstone: Pledge Against New Nuclear Power Stations in Scotlandâ€”As an amendment to motion (S2M-4329) in the name of Shiona Baird, leave out from first "notes" to end and insert "believes that Scotland needs a balanced energy policy to meet the energy needs of the nation, including a mixture of generation from a range of technologies, including coal, oil, gas, renewables and nuclear; further believes that our energy policy must support sustainable economic growth while simultaneously fighting against fuel poverty, and believes that the decisions on the future make-up of our energy provision, which should include a nuclear component, need to be made now."
